text: [Music]
hpe is driving a cloud everywhere
strategy
our goal is to meet our customers where
they're at on their cloud journey
whether that be at the edge the data
center the colo or the cloud we see more
and more customers looking for cloud
strategies and our partnership with
training and certification really drove
that requirement that we have from our
customers the aws training program
really enabled us to enhance our
delivery resources
experience and expertise on aws cloud
this is a critical part to what our
customers around the world are asking
for to have deep cloud experience
covet has forced a number of changes on
customers in the past year plus
customers have had to
rapidly shift and reprioritize
movement of their infrastructure to
cloud platforms such as aws so last year
customers had to do that in a very hasty
fashion and now circumstances are
changing it's giving customers an
opportunity to go back and to revisit
what they did previously and optimize
that
so that it's more suited for present day
and sets them up for the future and so
hpe has been instrumental in helping
with that and we're utilizing the
knowledge and skills that we've gained
from our aws certification program to
help customers re-envision their systems
for this new world post covent hpe has
an established partnership with aws and
so we've really been able to work
together to bring about the learning
that our team members need including a
learner needs assessment that we've done
and then also developing a program in
2020 that was four weeks long and it was
a blended learning program over the
course of the first four-week program
that we did we had over 800 team members
go through that and because it was so
successful we repeated that program
multiple times during the next 12 months
the result was that we had over 2000
accreditations
and we had over 518 certifications added
to
our hpe team we plan on extending our
aws training and certification to more
delivery resources within the hpe
delivery organization as well the people
that have already taken trainings we
want to continue to evolve their skills
and expertise to drive that intimacy
with our customers so we're really
looking forward to driving more
trainings in the next year and really
driving that expertise that our clients
are looking for
